text:
Created attachment 25029
Snapshot of the links.

On the org.apache.log4j.xml.examples.XMLSample page of the API docs (http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/org/apache/log4j/xml/examples/XMLSample.html), the following links are broken:

- example code: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/org/apache/log4j/xml/examples/XMLSample.java

- sample1.xml: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/org/apache/log4j/xml/examples/sample1.xml

- sample2.xml: http://logging.apache.org/log4j/1.2/apidocs/org/apache/log4j/xml/examples/sample2.xml
